name: Coded Race/Ethnicity Messaging Information Group
description: This use case examines the ability of the communication of re-coded race and ethnicity information in a Coded Race & Ethnicity Report from the national statistics agency to the National Center for Health Statistics (NCHS). Coded Race and Ethnicity Document: These clinical statements represent race and ethnicity data in a standard, codified format for exchange between the national statistical agency and the jurisdictional vital records office. This document type supports the Coded Race/Ethnicity Messaging use case, eliminating duplication and providing reliable delivery of coded race and ethnicity information for reporting to vital records.
